title: princess_peach_(kimono)
body:
An [[official alternate costume]] for [[Princess Peach]] in [[Mario Kart Tour]], putting her in a [[pink kimono]] with a [[cherry blossom print]] on it. Also wears [[tabi]] and a pair of [[red footwear|red]] [[okobo]], as well as her hair up in a ponytail with a [[red bow|red]] [[hair bow|bow]].

Not to be confused with her [[Princess Peach (yukata) (mario Kart Tour)|yukata costume]] from the same game.

h4. See also

* [[Princess Peach (Kimono) (KCMEX2009)]]
* [[Princess Peach (Kimono) (Club Nintendo)]]

title: princess_peach_(yukata)_(super_mario_odyssey)
body:
[[Princess Peach]] dressed in a [[yukata]], first appearing in [i][[Super Mario Odyssey]][/i] when her and [[Tiara (mario)|Tiara]] travel to Bowser's Kingdom. 

She's dressed in a [[white kimono|white]] [[yukata]] with [[fire flower]]s [[floral print|printed]] on it, wrapped in a light [[blue sash|blue]] [[obi]]. On her feet she wears a pair of [[brown footwear|brown]] [[geta]] with light blue straps. She has a [[Boo (Mario)|Boo]] [[character mask|mask]] [[mask on head|on her head]] and her hair is tied up in a [[ponytail]]. She's often holding an [[uchiwa]] that has the image a [[blooper (mario)|Blooper]] on it.

While it wouldn't appear in [i][[Mario Kart Tour]][/i] unlike some other Peach outfits from Super Mario Odyssey (with [[Princess Peach (yukata) (mario Kart Tour)|another yukata]] design appearing instead), it would make an appearance in [i][[Mario Kart World]][/i].

h4. Appearance

* !asset #24572696: Profile
* !asset #24573095: Reference sheet, including unused designs. Art of these unused designs should use this tag as well.

title: princess_peach_(yukata)_(mario_kart_tour)
body:
An [[official alternate costume]] for [[Princess Peach]] in [[Mario Kart Tour]], putting her in a [[white kimono|white]] [[yukata]] with a [[heart print]] on it. She also wears a pair of [[brown footwear|brown]] [[geta]], as well as a [[Boo (Mario)|Boo]] [[character mask|mask]] [[mask on head|on her head]], her hair also tied up in a [[ponytail]]. Often seen holding an [[uchiwa]].

Not to be confused with her [[Princess Peach (Kimono)|kimono costume]] from the same game.

h4. See also

* [[Princess Peach (Yukata) (Super Mario Odyssey)]]

title: yelena_belova
body: Yelena Belova (Russian: Еле́на Бело́ва) is a fictional character appearing in American comic books published by [[marvel|Marvel Comics]]. Created by writer Devin Grayson and artist J.G. Jones, the character appeared as a sketch in Marvel Knights: Wave 2 Sketchbook #1 (January 1998) before debuting a year later in the second volume of Inhumans #5 (January 1999) by writer Paul Jenkins and artist Jae Lee.

title: children's_day
body:
[b]Children's Day[/b] is a holiday, celebrated on June 1 in many countries and on May 5 in Japan.

This tag applies to the International Children's Day (listed below), for the Japanese holiday see [[kodomo no hi]].

* International Children's Day (June 1) (Japanese: 国際子供の日/Chinese: 六一国际儿童节/六一國際兒童節)
* Universal Children's Day/World Children's Day (November 20) (Japanese: 世界こどもの日)

h4. See Also

* "Wikipedia article":https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Children%27s_Day

title: marie_antoinette_alter_(fate)
body:
[[marie antoinette (fate)|Marie Antoinette's]] [[alter servant|alter form]], first appeared as an NPC in [[Fate/Grand Order]]'s crossover event with [[Fate/Requiem]]. This form depicts Marie in the stereotypical "tyrannical queen" personality originated from various French anti-monarchist propaganda as opposed to her actual personality.

The easiest way to tell them apart is that the normal Marie has blue eyes, while this Alter version has [[yellow eyes]], and a noticeably older appearance as her Saint Graph is ascended, with [[large breasts|larger breasts]]; her biography updates her weight from 48 to 53kg due to this. She was officially revealed to be a 5* Avenger, released at the same time as Ordeal Call 2: Id. 

h4.Ascensions

* [[marie antoinette alter (first ascension) (fate)|First Ascension]]
* [[marie antoinette alter (second ascension) (fate)|Second Ascension]]
* [[marie antoinette alter (third ascension) (fate)|Third Ascension]]
* [[marie antoinette alter (kyomaf 2024) (fate)|KyoMaf 2024]]

title: genba_neko_(meme)
body:
lit. "accident site cat" or "work site cat", translated on Pixiv as "#safety cat"

* !post #7146200

Originally based on [[Denwa Neko (kumamine)|an image of a cat]] asking "why are you up so late at night?", the Genba Neko meme primarily references a cat in a hard hat pointing and saying 「ヨシ！」 (Okay!). Unfortunately, the conditions referenced by the cat are often not "Okay!" as a result of simple job site carelessness, overwork leading to accidents, substance abuse, and other gross safety violations. While most pictures refer the pointing "Okay!" image, some call back to the image of the cat on the phone, some depict the tragic aftermath of workplace accidents, and some foreshadow such events (references to [[Strong Zero]] and other alcoholic beverages, close-ups of the cat sweating unnaturally, and notes about how workers who skip holidays "are built different"). Some common variations can be seen on the "Genba Neko Twitter bot":[https://twitter.com/genbaneko_bot].

For depictions of Genba Neko as a character, see [[Genba Neko (character)]].

title: genba_neko_(character)
body:
("Site Worker Cat")

An occupational [i]un[/i]safety-themed [[futaba channel]] [[meme]] character, whose face is based on [[Kumamine]]'s [[Denwa Neko (kumamine)|]].

Later [[Kumamine]] himself made a remake of the character, and named it [[Shigoto Neko]]. Kumamine's remake of the character can be distinguished from the Futaba version by way of their helmets, with Shigoto Neko having white hard hats with a black paw print symbol on it, while Genba Neko have yellow hard hats with green crosses for symbols.

h4. See also

* [[Genba Neko (meme)]] - for the pointing pose itself

h4. External links

* "The origin of the character's body (sozaing.com)":[http://sozaing.com/material/%E4%BA%BA%E5%9E%8B%E3%82%AA%E3%83%96%E3%82%B8%E3%82%A7%E3%82%AF%E3%83%88%e3%80%80%E6%80%92%E3%82%8B.html]
* "Wikipedia: Shigoto Neko (JP)":[https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E4%BB%95%E4%BA%8B%E7%8C%AB]
* "Nicopedia (JP)":[http://dic.nicovideo.jp/id/5539221]

title: mlynar_(arknights)
body:
[i]A wanderer from a Kazimierzian knight family, Młynar, with his sword always resting by his side.[/i]

A playable Guard Operator in [[Arknights]].

Real Name: Młynar Nearl

h4. Profile
[expand]
[table]
[tbody]
      [tr][td]Place of Birth:[/td]
      [td]Kazimierz[/td][/tr]

      [td]191 cm[/td][/tr]
      [tr][td]Combat Experience:[/td]
      [td]17 years[/td][/tr]
  [/tbody]
[/table]
[/expand]

The uncle of Margaret and Maria Nearl (both of whom are known by their respective operator names [[Nearl (Arknights)|Nearl]] and [[Blemishine (Arknights)|Blemishine]]), and the cousin of Zofia Nearl (known as [[Whislash (Arknights)|Whislash]]).

His given name is stylized as [b]Młynar[/b]. Due to Danbooru character limitations, his name is rendered as "Mlynar" instead.

His [[voice actor]]s are [[Koyama Rikiya]] (Japanese), Wang Yuhang (Chinese), Anthony Howell (English) and Choi Hyun-soo (Korean). His illustrator is [[Ryuuzaki Ichi]].

title: savage_(arknights)
body:
[i]Savage, Guard Operator of Rim Billiton, has always been thinking of doing something for you and Amiya.[/i]

A playable Guard Operator in [i][[Arknights]][/i].

h4. Profile
[expand]
[table]
[tbody]
      [tr][td]Place of Birth:[/td]
      [td]RIM Billiton[/td][/tr]
      [tr][td]Birthday:[/td]

      [td]Cautus[/td][/tr]
      [tr][td]Height:[/td]
      [td]160 cm[/td][/tr]
      [tr][td]Combat Experience:[/td]
      [td]4 years[/td][/tr]
  [/tbody]
[/table]
[/expand]

A former agent of a mining company's security force from Rim Billiton. She uses her Arts to detonate her hammer and cause wide devastation, hence her codename.

She is a kind, cheerful, reliable and friendly operator. She likes playing football and cooking.

She personally knows [[Amiya (arknights)|]] and the [[Doctor (arknights)|]], even before the latter's amnesia.

Her [[voice actor]]s are Ayumi Jukimura (Japanese, former), Sachie Hirai (Japanese, current), Muyaruilin (Chinese), Stephanie Sheh (English), and Lee Bo-hee (Korean). Her original art designer is [[renatus.z|TOKI]], while her new outfit has designed by [[usu (9619usu)|usu]].

Uses throwing knives and musical instruments with concealed daggers during battle.

Her motif is based on lyrebirds.

title: gawr_gura
body:
A former [[Virtual Youtuber|VTuber]], part of Generation 1, of [[Hololive English]] (also known as [[holoMyth]]). A shark-loving Atlantean who came to the surface because she finds it boring down in the ocean. She was designed by [[Amashiro Natsuki]].

She was one of the most subscribed VTubers, having surpassed VTuber pioneer [[Kizuna Ai]] back in 2021. 

On April 16, 2025, "she announced":[https://www.youtube.com/live/7WFg2wq10rw?feature=shared] that she would be graduating from hololive, with a graduation stream on May 1st.

She is a [[shark girl]] with [[sharp teeth]] and a [[shark tail]]. She has [[blue eyes]] and [[medium hair|medium-length]] or [[long hair|long]] [[grey hair]] with [[blue hair|blue]] [[streaked hair|streaks]], her default hairstyle consists of a [[two side up]] with [[blunt bangs]] and [[shark hair ornament]]s.

title: bridal_gauntlets
body:
A type of tight-fitting handwear, usually elbow-length. Its major distinguishing feature is that it is secured by a ring or loop of cloth about one finger, rather than separate finger-holes. Commonly worn as part of a [[wedding dress]], hence the name.

[b]Note[/b]: This tag refers to a specific style of glove and [b]does not[/b] refer to every glove worn with a [[wedding dress]]. Gloves worn with a wedding dress that are not of this specific style should simply be tagged [[wedding dress]] and [[gloves]] instead.

h4. See Also

* [[bridal legwear]]
* [[elbow gloves]]
* [[fingerless gloves]]
* [[gloves]]
* [[partially fingerless gloves]]

title: jirai_kei
body:
A fashion subculture for "landmine-type" girls that originated in Japan's "Kabukichō":[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kabukich%C5%8D] district and first spread in popularity in early 2020.

Characteristics of this fashion include [[short twintails]] or [[two side up]], [[mouth mask]]s, frilled [[collared shirt]]s, high-waist [[suspender skirt]]s, [[fishnets]], and the overwhelming usage of pink and black. Countless variations exist, but they should all fit the theme described above.

Fashion consists of two sides: 量産型 (ryousangata, literally "mass production") - a more mainstream girly style, and サブカル (subculture) - the more alternative and dark variant. Do note that the latter term is also used for alternative fashion in general.

h4. Examples

* !post #7260655
* !post #5636263
* !post #7347938
* !post #7126122
* !post #6239111

h4. See also

* [[yami kawaii]]
* [[tag group:fashion style]]

A quiet and laid back driver and operator from [[penguin_logistics_(arknights)|Penguin Logistics]]. She was sent to Rhodes Island along with her teammates as a liaison, where she assists with a variety of operations. Her choice of weapon is a beam sword.

Often depicted together with [[Lappland_(Arknights)|Lappland]] due to their past relationship.

Her motif is based on wolves. Her callsign is named after the now extinct [i]Texas Wolf[/i].

Her [[voice actor]]s are [[tadokoro azusa|Azusa Tadokoro]] (Japanese), Menglu Yang (Chinese), Jessica Preddy (English), Kim Chae-ha (Korean), and Ilaria Silvestri (Italian). Her art designer is [[Huanxiang Heitu]].

A bright and cheerful gunner and operator from [[penguin_logistics_(arknights)|Penguin Logistics.]] She was sent to Rhodes Island along with her teammates as a liaison, where she assists with a variety of operations. Her choice of weapon is the [[Kriss Vector]] [[submachine_gun|sub-machine gun]].

A common theme in fanart is her love of [[apple pie]], based on her combat dialogue of shouting "apple pie".

As a Sankta, her motif is an angel. She has a bright halo above her head and small energy "wings" coming out of her back at all times, regardless of her clothes.

She has an older non-blood related sister named [[Lemuen (Arknights)|Lemuen]].

Her [[voice actor|voice actresses]] are [[Iwami Manaka]] (Japanese), Cai Shujin (Chinese), Leonora Haig (English), and Lee Ji-hyun (Korean). Her original art designer  is [[huanxiang heitu]], while her [b]Midnight Delivery[/b] outfit is drawn by [[weiyu jiang]].

title: shiiko_sugai
body:
A fictional female character from the [[Gundam]] [[mecha]]verse. She appears in [[Gundam GQuuuuuux]] from 2025.

[b]Shiiko Sugai[/b] is a very skilled veteran [[mobile suit]] combat pilot who fought for the [[Earth Federation]] during [[mobile_suit_gundam|The One Year War]]. 

[spoilers]Shiiko used to be called "The Witch" and became a feared [i]unicum[/i] (a MS ace), who scored over 100 kills against [[Zeon]] during the war.

She does not believe in the existence of Newtypes, but she herself is proven to be one. Shiiko dies in a competitive battle while using the new [[gelgoog_(gquuuuuux)|Gelgoog]]  against the [[Red Gundam]] piloted by [[Shuji Ito]]. In her final moments she shares a [[Newtype Flash]] connection with Shuji and sees him and also her little son.[/spoilers]

title: queen_sectonia
body:
The true antagonist and final boss of [i][[Kirby: Triple Deluxe]][/i]. She is a giant, beauty-obsessed wasp queen who has been terrorizing the [[people of the sky]] well before the events of the main story. Said main story kicks off when the people have had enough of her tyranny and decide to summon a hero with the Dreamstalk.

Hearing about this rebellion, the twisted queen sends her trusted servant [[Taranza]] to capture this hero. When Taranza fails her by mistaking [[King Dedede]] as the hero (and thus incurring the wrath of [[Kirby]]), Sectonia supposedly offs her servant and takes matters into her own hands.

After a long, drawn-out battle (which included Sectonia fusing with the Dreamstalk), Kirby defeats her with his newly-discovered Hypernova [[copy_ability|ability]]. She has an additional form in The True Arena, called [[Soul of Sectonia]].

Queen Sectonia is implied to have looked much different in the past, less like a wasp, and more like [[Taranza]]. This form is referred to as [[Queen Sectonia (Old Friend)|Old Friend]] in [i][[Kirby's Return to Dream Land Deluxe]][/i]. 

[spoiler]As implied by the "Old Friend" moniker, flavor text from her boss fights, as well as Miiverse posts from [[Kumazaki Shin'ya]], confirm that she has not always been evil. In fact, she was rather benevolent to her people. It was thanks to constantly gazing in the [[Dimension Mirror]] (gifted to her by Taranza) that pushed her down the path of villainy. Whether or not [[Dark Meta Knight]] or [[Dark Mind]] (who is implied to be still alive in the form of King D-Mind) is responsible for this remains unknown.[/spoiler]

[spoiler]DNA informaton (courtesy of the Haltmann Works Company) suggests that she acquired her wasp form through magic and feeding off of countless hosts. When her clone is defeated in [i][[Kirby: Planet Robobot]][/i], she shows her base "Old Friend" form like the [[Dark Matter (kirby)|]] clone did for itself in the prior fight. Her appearance suggests that she and Taranza are of the same species and were even very close friends or lovers at some point.[/spoiler]

title: robin_(honkai:_star_rail)
body:
A playable character in [[Honkai: Star Rail]] and the little sister of [[Sunday (Honkai: Star Rail)|]]. Voiced by [[Nazuka Kaori]] in Japanese. 

She is portrayed with [[long hair|long]] [[light blue hair]], [[head wings]], [[halo]], [[green eyes]], and [[medium breasts]]. Her default outfit consists of a [[strapless dress|strapless]] [[two-tone dress]] set in [[white dress|white]] and [[purple dress|purple]], [[white gloves|white]] [[elbow gloves]], [[feather boa]], and [[purple footwear|purple]] [[high heels]].

h4. Costumes

* !post #7691440: Splash art
* !post #7484059: [[Robin (Star Rail Live 2024) (Honkai: Star Rail)|Star Rail Live 2024]]
* !post #8513172: [[Robin (Brilliant Youth) (Honkai: Star Rail)|Brilliant Youth]]

h4. Profile
[expand]
"There's a saying — the more demanding the diner, the stronger the skills of the chef... but no matter what others say, I'll always be demanding more from myself."

A Halovian singer born in Penacony and rose to cosmic fame. An elegant and demure young lady. This time, she has been invited home by The Family to grace everyone with a song at the Charmony Festival.

She can use the power of Harmony to broadcast her music, manifesting "resonance" among not only her fans but all manner of lifeforms.
[/expand]

title: tokime_shizuka
body:
A character in [[Magia Record: Mahou Shoujo Madoka Magica Gaiden]]. She is the leader of the Tokime Tribe.

h4. Appearance

She has [[purple eyes]] and [[long hair|long]] [[grey hair]] with [[sidelocks]]; usually tied into [[twintails]].

In her daily life, she wears a [[red headwear|red]] [[beret]] with a [[striped bow|striped]] [[hat bow|bo]][[bow|w]], a [[brown bowtie|brown]]/[[purple bowtie|purple]] [[bowtie]], a shirt with a pair of [[long sleeves|long]] [[white sleeves]] with [[sleeve cuffs|cuffs]]; a [[ring]], a [[skirt set]] consisting of a [[red vest|red]] [[pinstripe vest|pinstripe]] [[vest]] with [[buttons]] and a [[wing collar]]; a [[red skirt|red]] [[pinstripe skirt|pinstripe]] [[medium skirt|medium]] [[skirt]] with [[frilled skirt|frills]] and a [[brown bow|brown]]/[[purple bow|purple]] [[back bow]]; [[black pantyhose]] and [[brown footwear|brown]] [[loafers]].

As a [[Magical Girl]], she wears [[purple ribbon|purple]] and [[yellow ribbon|yellow]] [[hair ribbon|ribbons]], a [[brown scarf|brown]]/[[purple scarf|purple]] [[scarf]], a [[short kimono|short]] [[purple kimono|purple]] [[kimono]] with [[short sleeves]], a [[kimono skirt]] and [[frilled kimono|frills]]; a [[yellow sash|yellow]] [[obi]] with a [[back bow]], [[wide sleeves|wide]] [[detached sleeves|detached]] [[furisode]] sleeves, [[bridal gauntlets]], [[white thighhighs|white]] [[thighhighs|thighhigh]] [[tabi]], and [[okobo]]. body:
A character in [[Magia Record: Mahou Shoujo Madoka Magica Gaiden]]. She is the leader of Neo-Magius, an organization claiming Magical Girl Supremacy.

h4. Appearance

She has [[short hair|short]] [[purple hair]] with [[blunt ends]], [[hair between eyes|bangs between her eyes]] and [[purple eyes]].

In her daily life, she has her hair tied into a [[half updo]], and wears the [[Kamihama Future Academy school uniform]] paired with [[earrings]] and [[black socks|black]] [[kneehighs]].

As a [[Magical Girl]], her hair is tied into a [[bow-shaped hair|bow]], and she wears a [[sleeveless kimono|sleeveless]] [[purple kimono|purple]] [[kimono]] [[cropped kimono|crop top]], [[long sleeves|long]] [[detached sleeves|detached]] [[furisode]] with a [[floral print|floral]] [[print sleeves|print]], a [[red ribbon|red]] and [[yellow ribbon|yellow]] [[ribbon]] tied into a [[flower knot]], a [[frilled skirt|frilled]] [[purple skirt|purple]]/[[white skirt|white]] [[miniskirt]] decorated with a [[purple gemstone]], an [[anklet]] and [[brown footwear|brown]] [[toeless footwear|toeless]] [[boots]]. She also has [[stomach tattoo|stomach]] and [[leg tattoo]]s, and fights with a [[pink shawl|pink]] [[hagoromo]].

title: raisa_pottgen
body:
Character from [[World Witches_Series]].

A Pilot Officer from Karlsland serving under the 31st Joint Fighter Squadron Africa. Close friends with [[Hanna-Justina Marseille]].

Her weapon is an MG34 machine gun. Her familiar is a shrike, and she's based on Rainer Pöttgen.

title: zenobia_(fate)
body:
Archer-class servant introduced in [[Fate/Grand Order]]'s [[Halloween Rising!]] event. The famous warrior queen of the Palmyran kingdom during the crisis of the third century. Well known for her defensive campaign against the Roman emperor Aurelian, whom she eventually fell in love with and married in exchange for sparing her country. She was designed by [[Nishiide Kengorou]] and voiced by Umeka Shouji.

In-game, Zenobia is depicted wearing a black [[bikini]] and a [[g-string]], with her dress being torn down, and being repaired and covering her body in her second and third ascension. According to her lore, the reason for her to wear a scantily-clad costume was because she believed that [[nudist|body exposure is not an indecent act]].

[b]Character Design:[/b] [[Nishiide Kengorou]]
[b]Voice Actress:[/b] [[Shouji Umeka]]

title: jacques_de_molay_(foreigner)_(fate)
body:
Foreigner-class Servant introduced in the [[Halloween Rising!|Halloween 2021 event]] of [[Fate/Grand Order]]. A [[genderswap]]ped version of the 23rd and the last grandmaster of the [[Knights Templar]].

The Foreigner Jacques de Molay is an innocent Heroic Spirit, whose Spirit Origin has been warped and transformed by the scandals and stigma spread by the people in power and the masses who were envious of the Templars. Furthermore, having been possessed by the evil god proclaiming to be the "Holy Mother of the Abyss" that hastens the corruption of mankind, that evil nature has been boosted. Notably turned his body into that of a woman.

It is said that the symbol of the ominous and sinister, "Friday the 13th", comes from the day of the incident when the Templars were simultaneously exposed.

For the original male Saber-class version of Molay, see [[Jacques de Molay (Saber) (fate)|]].

[b]Character Design:[/b] [[Kuroboshi Kouhaku]]
[b]Voice Actress:[/b] [[Aoki Shiki]]

title: caenis_(fate)
body:
Lancer-class Servant of [[Kirschtaria Wodime]] first appearing in [[Fate/Grand Order]]'s [[Anastasia (lostbelt) (fate/grand order)|Anastasia]] Lostbelt. She was released as a playable servant after the [[Olympus (fate/grand order)|]] Lostbelt.

In Greek mythology, Caenis was a woman who was raped by Poseidon. Afterwards, Poseidon granted her a wish; Caenis wished to become an invulnerable warrior. Poseidon granted her wish, turning Caenis into the male Caeneus.

The version appearing in Fate/Grand Order has her original female body, but is often referred to with male pronouns by others in the game. She uses the masculine personal pronoun [b]Ore[/b].

[b]Character Design:[/b] [[Azusa (hws)|]]
[b]Voice Actress:[/b] [[Komatsu Mikako]]

title: kama_(fate)
body:
Assassin-class Servant based on the Hindi god of love and one of the [[Matou Sakura|Sakurafaces]], who first debuted in [[Fate/Grand Order]].

In-game, Kama is portrayed as an arrogant and sexually provocative goddess, being fully aware that her association with love has led into people associate her with lust as well. However, she is easily flustered when a genuine affection is directed at her.

title: gaia_gear
body:
A 1987 novel series written by [[Tomino Yoshiyuki]] and featuring mecha designs by [[Itou Mamoru (artist)|]], originally published as serials in [[Newtype]] before being compiled into 5 volumes. The series is set in the far future of the UC [[Gundam]] timeline (UC 203) and follows [[Afranshia Char]] - a memory clone of [[Char Aznable]].

The series is currently considered non-canon. 

h4. See also

* [[Man Machine]] - the general name for [[mecha]] in this series

title: cut-here_line
body:
A typically [[dotted line]] with a [[scissors]] symbol (though sometimes other instruments or a direction indicator might be shown), indicating a line along with something should be cut. Often used in [[neck tattoo]]s to imply [[decapitation]].

Also used in a [[twitter strip game]] variant in which strips of a shirt worn by a character are cut off as the numbers of likes and retweets increase.

title: char's_counterattack_-_beltorchika's_children
body:
A 1988 novel by [[Tomino Yoshiyuki]]. It is Tomino's original version of [[Char's Counterattack]].

The two notable mobile suits are [[Hi-Nu Gundam]] and [[Nightingale (gundam)|]]. 

[[Beltorchika Irma]] is featured prominently in the novel.

title: casval_rem_deikun
body:
A fictional character from the [[Gundam]] series. He first appeared in [[Mobile Suit Gundam]] from 1979.

[b]Casval Rem Deikun[/b] [spoilers]is the real name and identity of [[Zeon]] [[mobile_suit|MS]] ace [[Char Aznable]]. He is the actual brother of [[Sayla Mass]]/[[Artesia Som Deikun]] and true heir to Zeon.[/spoilers]

title: osawa_rurino's_cardboard_box
body:
A pink and white [[cardboard box]] owned by [[Osawa Rurino]] from [[Link! Like! Love Live!]]. It was given to her by her fellow clubmates as a way to recharge her social battery, much to her dismay. [spoiler]Then she started using it anyway.[/spoiler] 

It has since been extensively decorated with [[sticker]]s and [[drawing (object)|]]s.

title: charlotte_corday_(fate)
body:
Assassin-class Servant seen in [[Fate/Grand Order]]. A figure from the French Revolution who assassinated Jean-Paul Marat and was subsequently executed by [[Charles-Henri Sanson (fate)|]] on the [[guillotine]] for her crime.

She first appears in the opening animation for Part 2 of Fate/Grand Order before being released as a playable servant during the 5th anniversary. Before her name was revealed, fans gave her the nickname [b]Tawawa Assassin[/b] (たわわのアサシン), due to her striking resemblance (both her face and her [[large breasts|breast size]]) to [[Ai-chan (tawawa)|]] from the [[Getsuyoubi no Tawawa]] series.

She is accompanied by a mysterious yellow [[creature]] she refers to as an angel, resembling an egg with [[feathered wings]] and a [[halo]].

[b]Character Design:[/b] [[Aotsuki Takao]]
[b]Voice Actress:[/b] [[Horie Yui]]

title: alfredo_oriani_(azur_lane)
body:
[[Azur Lane]]'s personification of the Italian destroyer [i]Alfredo Oriani[/i]. Character designed by [[Namyo]], voiced by [[Natsuyoshi Yuuko]]. 

She is portrayed in-game with [[long hair|long]] light [[brown hair]] tied to a [[ponytail]], and [[blue eyes]]. Her default outfit consists of a [[sleeveless]] [[white dress]] with gold fringe and her real-life hull letters "OA" printed on the skirt-side, [[sunglasses]], a [[black jacket]] with a red inner layer, a [[thigh strap]] to her right leg, [[white thighhighs]], [[knee boots]], a bag slung to her side, and a [[camera]].

Her [[rigging]] consists of her two historic 120 mm twin mounts, one on each side, and two 533 mm triple [[torpedo tubes]], one on each side.

In real-life, she was the name ship of her class of four destroyers grouped under the 9th Destroyer Division, commissioned in 1937. She was also the only survivor of the four and saw post-war service with France until 1954.

h4. Skins

* !post #5674577: Base art

title: akemi_homura
body:
A character from [[Mahou Shoujo Madoka Magica]].

She has [[long hair|long]] [[black hair]], [[purple eyes]], and wears a [[hairband]]. When transformed into her [[magical girl|magical]] form, she wears a [[capelet]], a [[pleated skirt]], [[high heels|high heeled]] [[boots]] with [[argyle footwear|argyle]] patterns that cover the entire legs, and sometimes also has a [[shield]] on her lower left arm. She primarily uses mundane weapons such as guns and bombs. 

[spoiler]Her shield acts like a seemingly infinite portable storage space for her weapons, and also allows her to manipulate and travel through time.[/spoiler]

She is voiced by [[Saitou Chiwa]].

title: akuma_homura
body:
An alternate form of [[Akemi Homura]] seen in [[Mahou Shoujo Madoka Magica: Hangyaku no Monogatari]].

Usually drawn with [[feathered wings]], a [[black dress]] with [[bare shoulders]], a [[choker]], [[argyle thighhighs]] with [[high heels]] and [[black gloves|black]] [[elbow gloves]], in addition to Akemi Homura's usual [[long hair|long]] [[black hair]] and [[purple eyes]]. Her hair is usually tied up with a [[hair bow|bow]].

Her familiars are the [[Clara Dolls (madoka magica)|]].

Also known as "Homucifer" in reference to [i]Paradise Lost[/i].

Do not use just for [[Akemi Homura]] in a [spoiler]post-Rebellion[/spoiler] scene. Only use if the signature outfit is present.

h4. See also

* [[Dark Orb (madoka magica)|]]

title: tag_group:legwear
body:
[See [[tag groups]].]

This is the list of tags for legwear (socks, thighhighs, etc.)

There are many types of legwear present in the images hosted on Danbooru. It is expected of you to identify the type of legwear and not just the color when tagging an image.

Doing this helps maintain good tagging standards as well as help those who wish to find images.

h4. Main tags / Legwear by height

* [[socks]]
* [[kneehighs]] (covers the feet and legs up to the knees)
* [[over-kneehighs]] (covers the leg from the foot up to just above the knees)
* [[thighhighs]] (covers the leg from the foot up to the mid-thighs)
* [[pantyhose]] (covers from the waist to the toes)
* [[leggings]] (like pantyhose, but doesn't cover the feet)
** [[detached leggings]] (more like footless thighhighs)

See post #86570 for reference

She has [[orange eyes]] and [[short hair|short]] [[red hair]] stylized with a [[two side up]] & [[blunt bangs|blunt]] [[bangs]]. body:
A character from [[Goddess of Victory: Nikke]].

The leader of [[Inherit (nikke)|]], Dorothy serves as a guide for newcomers within Eden, a remote place situated on the surface where humans and Nikkes coexist. Her courteous facade hides an insidious and cruel personality.

In the earliest days of the Rapture invasion, Dorothy served as a member of the [[Goddess (Nikke)|]] squad, consisting of her, [[Liliweiss (nikke)|]], [[Snow White (Innocent Days) (nikke)|Snow White]], [[Scarlet (Black Shadow) (nikke)|Scarlet]], [[Red Hood (nikke)|]] and [[Rapunzel (nikke)|]]. She took the role of acting leader after Liliweiss's untimely death.

During their battle for survival and the defense of the Ark, Dorothy was forced to euthanize her fellow Nikke and friend, [[Pinne (nikke)|]], when the latter became corrupted. This plunged Dorothy into spiraling depression, leading her to attempt suicide. However, the other members of the Goddess squad managed to stop her and confined her to prevent self-harm. In isolation, Dorothy suffered from hallucinations of Pinne, much to her squadmates' confusion.

Not long after Pinne's death, the Central Government of the Ark betrayed the Goddess squad by sealing them outside. As a result, Dorothy was left to wander around the surface, becoming filled with bitterness and resentment towards the Ark, and had been planning long-term about her revenge before becoming the leader of Inherit.

As she was a former member of Goddess squad like the Pioneer squad members, Dorothy is named after a children's novel character instead of a Biblical figure. In this case, she is named after [[Dorothy Gale]], the protagonist of the "The Wonderful Wizard of Oz":[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Wonderful_Wizard_of_Oz].

She has [[long hair|long]] [[pink hair]] a in [[side braid]] and a [[side up bun]] on the left side, along with [[pink eyes|pink]]/[[purple eyes]] and [[large breasts]]. Her regular outfit consists of a [[see-through dress|see-through]] [[frilled dress|frilled]] [[white dress]] with [[detached sleeves]] which partially shows her [[white panties]], [[white thighhighs]], and [[high heels]]. She can transform into her battle form which consist of [[armored dress]] with [[horns|horn]]-like [[headgear]], [[bracer]], [[mechanical wings]], and [[armored boots]].

Illustrator: [[Yoya Yogurt]]
Voice Actress: [[Saitou Chiwa]](JP)

title: rengoku_(fate)
body:
The name of [[Okita Souji Alter (fate)|]]'s long katana.

Rengoku becomes personified as an [[androgynous]] [[child]] of "ambiguous gender":https://www.reddit.com/r/grandorder/comments/pl0ogq/profiles_of_the_four_new_summer_servants/ alongside [[Okita Souji Alter (Swimsuit Saber) (fate)|Okita Souji Alter Swimsuit Saber]]. They have the form of a child for Okita's 1st and 2nd Ascensions and returns to being a sword in her 3rd ascension.

This tag is for the human personification of the sword. For the sword itself, see [[Rengoku (sword) (fate)|]].

title: asfeld_academy_school_uniform
body: The uniform worn by students of the Asfeld Academy, featured in [[Dragon Quest X]]. The male version of the uniform typically consists of [[plaid pants]], a blue [[blazer]], a button-up [[white shirt]], and a [[red necktie]] that is occasionally plaid. For the summer months, the blazer is removed and replaced with a short-sleeved white shirt. As for the female uniform, it consists of a [[plaid skirt]], a [[double-breasted]] white and blue [[sailor shirt]], and a [[pink bow]]. The uniform is often portrayed as having both long-sleeved and short-sleeved versions. h4. Official art * !post #9233687

title: kirby's_dream_land_3
body:
A direct sequel to [[Kirby's Dream Land 2]]. [[Dark Matter (kirby)|]] isn't finished yet. This time, it decides to do a full-scale invasion on [[Planet Popstar]], destroying the planet's rings and taking control of as many of its inhabitants as it can. This isn't very subtle, so it immediately catches the attention of [[Kirby]] and his friend [[Gooey (kirby)|]]. Together with his animal friends (with newcomers [[Chuchu (kirby)|]], [[Nago (kirby)|]], and [[Pitch (kirby)|]]), Kirby and Gooey set out to save the day once again!

title: browning_m2
body:
The browning-m2 was the  [[heavy machine gun]] that fires the .50BMG cartridge and was produced for every branches of [[United states|United States military]], It was initially designed as an water-cooled prototype in 1921 by [[john moses browning|John M. Browning]], but the design was further developed for its barrel was physically stronger and quick to change with new barrel for reducing the overheating, and mass-produced for offical military uses in 1933. It is extensively used by various armed forces around the world, including the U.S Army. It is the second oldest weapon in the U.S Army's arsenal after [[m1911|M1911]] pistol.

h4. See also

* [[List of Weapons]]
* [[m2hb (girls'_frontline)]]

h4. External links

* "Wikipedia: Browning M2":https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/M2_Browning

title: mash_kyrielight
body:
[b]Mash Kyrielight[/b] (マシュ・キリエライト; also romanized as Matthew or Mashu) is a female character from [[Fate/Grand Order]] of the Shielder class. She is a Demi-Servant, a human fused with a Heroic Spirit. She works at the Chaldea Security Organization.

She is the first person the protagonist sees when he/she wakes up in Chaldea. She has [[short hair|short]], [[purple hair]] which [[hair over one eye|covers her right eye]] and [[purple eyes]]. When not in her servant form, she wears a [[necktie]], [[black dress]], [[jacket]], [[black pantyhose]] and [[glasses]]. In her servant form, she wears an [[armored dress]] and carries an enormous [[shield]], Lord Chaldeas (named by [[Olga Marie Animusphere]]). Later in the story it is revealed that [spoiler]the shield is in fact [[Lord Camelot (fate)|]], Galahad's Noble Phantasm.[/spoiler]

[b]Character Design:[/b] [[Takeuchi Takashi]]
[b]Voice Actress:[/b] [[Taneda Risa]] (before Sep 2016), [[Takahashi Rie]] (current)

The 9th [[official alternate costume|costume]] of [[hololive]]'s [[Hoshimachi Suisei]]. It was first revealed during her solo 3D live tour "[i]Spectra of Nova[/i]", including her 3D live show "[i]SuperNova[/i]".

In this costume she wears a [[white shirt|white]] [[shirt tucked in|tucked in shirt]] with [[black gloves]], [[black pants]] and [[black shoes|black]] [[high heels]].

For her [[official alternate hairstyle|official hairstyle]], she has [[short hair|short]] [[blue hair]] done in a [[bob cut]]-style.

title: hoshimachi_suisei_(oriental_suit)
body:
The 8th [[official alternate costume|costume]] of [[hololive]]'s [[Hoshimachi Suisei]], revealed on March 15, 2024, it has a 1920s oriental gangster theme and has comes in 2 [[official alternate color|colors]].

It consists of a [[black hat]] or [[white hat]] [[fedora]], a [[long sleeves|long-sleeved]] [[double-breasted]] [[white jacket|white]] or [[black jacket]] worn over a [[black shirt]] with [[gold trim]] and a [[mandarin collar]], a [[long skirt|long]] [[high-waist skirt|high-waist]] [[zipper skirt]] with a [[side slit]] with either a [[white skirt|white]] to [[blue skirt|blue]] or [[black skirt|black]] to [[red skirt|red]] [[gradient skirt|gradient]], [[white footwear|white]] or [[black boots|black]] [[toeless footwear|toeless]] [[zipper footwear|zipper]] [[platform boots]] with [[belt boots|belts]], she also has optional [[red-tinted eyewear|red]] or [[blue-tinted eyewear|blue]] [[round eyewear]] [[sunglasses]] and  [[official alternate eye color|her eyes can turn red now]].

Her [[official alternate hairstyle|official hairstyle]] in this costume is a [[long hair]] in a [[low ponytail]] [[hair over shoulder|hanging over her shoulder]] with [[swept bangs|swept]] [[asymmetrical bangs]].

title: hoshimachi_suisei_(1st_costume)
body:
The current default costume of [[hololive]]'s [[Hoshimachi Suisei]], designed by [[Teshima Nari]].

On her head she has a [[grey hat|grey]] [[plaid hat|plaid]] [[beret]] adorned with a [[crown]],  a [[blue choker|blue]] [[star choker]], a pair of [[star earrings]], and a [[blue ascot]].

She wears a [[white shirt|white]] [[collared shirt]], a [[skirt set]] comprising a [[double-breasted]] [[grey jacket|grey]] [[plaid jacket]] with [[three-quarter sleeves|three-quarter-length sleeves]] and white [[sleeve cuffs]], a two-part [[pleated skirt|pleated]] [[frilled skirt|black-frilled]] [[grey skirt|grey]] [[plaid skirt|plaid]] [[miniskirt]] with a left-cutout for a [[blue skirt|blue]] [[pleated skirt|pleated]] [[frilled skirt|black-frilled]] [[layered skirt]] which she wears with [[black shorts|black]] [[bike shorts]] underneath, and a [[blue belt]] adorned with a [[blue bow|blue]] [[waist bow]].

She furthermore has a pair of [[black gloves|black]] [[partially fingerless gloves]], a [[bead bracelet|beaded]] [[star bracelet]], and on her legs a pair of [[uneven legwear|uneven socks]] comprising a [[blue socks|blue]] [[single kneehigh|kneehigh]] and a [[black thighhighs|black]] [[single thighhigh|thighhigh]], a black [[thigh strap]], and a pair of [[black boots|black]]  [[high heel boots|high-heeled]] [[ankle boots]].

For her original design from her indie days and early Inonaka Music days, see [[Hoshimachi Suisei (old design)]].

h4. Appearance

* !post #3931913: Profile
* !post #3705812: Reference sheet

body:
The 5th [[official alternate costume|costume]] of [[hololive]]'s [[Hoshimachi Suisei]]. It was first revealed during her first solo 3D live concert "[i]STELLAR into the GALAXY[/i]".

It consists of a [[white shrug|white]]  with [[frilled sleeves|frilled]] [[quilted clothes|quilted]] [[juliet sleeves]], a [[blue brooch|blue]] [[brooch]], a [[frilled shirt|frilled]] [[blue shirt|blue]] [[vertical-striped shirt|vertical-striped]] [[pinstripe shirt]] under a [[blue vest]], s [[single glove|single]] a [[blue gloves]] [[single glove|single]] [[single half glove|half glove]], [[blue shorts]] a [[blue skirt|blue]] [[layered skirt|layered]] [[half-skirt|half]] [[overskirt]] with the outmost layer being a [[two-sided skirt]] with a [[pinstripe skirt|pinstripe patter]] on the outside and a [[starry sky print]] on the inside, a blue [[o-ring thigh strap]], [[blue boots|blue]] [[uneven footwear]] consisting of a [[single thigh boot]] and a wide boot, both of them with [[colored shoe soles|colored soles]] and [[platform heels]].

Her [[official alternate hairstyle|official hairstyle]] with this outfit is [[long hair]] in a [[half updo]] with a [[single side bun]], decorated with a [[tilted headwear|tilted]] [[crown]] on one side and multiple [[star hair ornament]]s on the other.

title: hoshimachi_suisei_(school_uniform)
body:
The 4th [[official alternate costume|costume]] of [[hololive]]'s [[Hoshimachi Suisei]].

It's a [[school uniform]]-themed outift and comes in 2 versions:
* A [[white serafuku]] consisting of  a [[grey cardigan|grey]] [[aran sweater|aran cardigan]], a [[blue choker]], a [[white shirt]] with a [[white sailor collar]] with a [[white dress]] underneath, a [[blue bowtie]] and a [[blue belt]].
* A [[black serafuku]] consisting of a [[white jacket|white]] [[hooded jacket]] with [[cat hood|cat ears]], a [[black choker]], a [[black shirt]] with a [[black sailor collar]] with a [[black dress]] underneath, a [[yellow bowtie]] and a [[grey belt]].

In both versions the shirt has [[frilled sleeves|frilled]] [[puffy short sleeves]], a [[star brooch]] holding the bowtie, the dress is a [[pleated dress|pleated]] and [[medium dress|knee-length]], and both have [[white socks]] and [[black footwear|black]] [[loafers]], she also wears [[pearl earrings]] on both versions.

Her [[official alternate hairstyle|official hairstyle]] with this outfit is [[long hair]] in a [[half updo]] with a [[single side bun|single]] [[side up bun]].

title: frutiger_metro
body:
A visual aesthetic popular in the mid-late 2000s to early 2010s, and a derivative of [[Frutiger Aero]], mixing flat minimalist design styles with overall maximalist imagery.

Common visual elements include gradients, "bloom" or "[[flourish (design)|]]" shapes, glossy textures, [[bokeh]], [[abstract background]]s, [[splatter]] effects, [[no lineart|lineless]] vector drawings, shapes such as [[star (symbol)|]]s and circles, and [[silhouette]]s. Bright color palettes consisting mainly of lime green, electric blue, hot pink and neon orange are a staple.

Common thematic elements and motifs include nature imagery similar to Frutiger Aero, [[animal]]s like [[bird]]s and [[butterfly|butterflies]], [[speaker]]s and [[audio visualizer]]s, [[flower|floral]] imagery, and music motifs such as [[piano keys]] and [[musical note]]s.

It derives its name from the "Metro" theme of [[Windows 8]].

h4. Examples

* !post #235300
* !post #6575582
* !post #336426
* !post #1080628

h4. See also

* [[Tag Group:Visual aesthetic]]

h4. External links

* "Aesthetics Wiki: Frutiger Metro":https://aesthetics.fandom.com/wiki/Frutiger_Metro

title: tenshi_kaiwai
body:
Japanese aesthetic and fashion style defined by the combination of light blue and white. More commonly referred to as simply "mizuiro" (water-colored).

Often features elements of kawaii subculture, and themes of [[angel]]s, [[water]], [[cloud]]s, [[pill]]s and [[syringe]]s, and technology. Fashion tends to include [[track jacket]]s and [[jersey maid]] outfits, as well as [[arm warmers]] and [[leg warmers]].

h4. Examples

title: amakusa_shirou_(fate)
body:
A character from the [[Fate/Apocrypha]] series. Master of [[Semiramis (fate)|]], sent by the Holy Church. He initially goes by the alias of [b]Shirou Kotomine[/b] (an homage to [[Kotomine Kirei]] and [[Emiya Shirou]]) before revealing his true nature as a Servant with the true name of "Amakusa Shirou":[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Amakusa_Shir%C5%8D], the leader of the Shimabara Rebellion. He appears as a Ruler-class servant in [[Fate/Grand Order]].

title: persona_5_the_royal
body:
An updated version of [[Persona 5]], featuring [[Yoshizawa Kasumi|a new playable character]], improved mechanics, and an extension to the main story if certain requirements are fulfilled. Originally released on the [[PlayStation 4]] in 2020, it received ports to [[Xbox One]], [[Xbox Series X]] and S, [[Nintendo Switch]], [[PlayStation 5]] and PC (via [[Steam (platform)|Steam]] and the Windows Store) in 2022.

Titled outside of Japan simply as [b]Persona 5 Royal[/b]. 

Only add this tag if content exclusive to [i]Royal[/i] is present.

title: nineball_seraph
body:
The upgraded version of [[nineball|Nine-ball]] and final boss of [[armored core: master of arena|Armored Core: Master of Arena]], it can be distinguished from the standard Nine-ball by its orange highlights and trademark wing-like back thrusters.
It can be considered the most famous [[mecha|AC]] in the [[Armored Core]] series because of its history and the difficulty of its fights when it appears.

It is associated with [[Cirno]] from [[Touhou]] for the same reasons as its standard version, being one of the strongest ACs and its association with the number 9.
[[Nineball=Cirno]] is commonly depicted with Nine-ball Seraph's color scheme and thrusters.

title: nineball
body:
The [[mecha | Armored Core (AC)]] piloted by Hustler One, the main antagonist of [[Armored Core]] and [[Armored Core: Master of Arena]], it is considered one of the strongest ACs. During the events of Armored Core and Masters of Arena it is revealed [spoilers]there are multiple Nine-balls and Hustler One is actually an AI controlling them[/spoilers]. 
Nine-ball is a recurring element in the series and appears or is referenced in most games.
 [[Nineball Seraph|Nine-Ball=Seraph]] is an upgraded version and most common depiction.

It is sometimes associated with [[Cirno]] from [[Touhou]] due to its status as the strongest AC and connection to the number 9.
[[Nineball=Cirno]] is a fusion of the two, generally depicted as Cirno with Nine-ball's color scheme and boosters.

title: g-suit
body:
The G-suit is an inflatable lower-body compress worn by [[fighter jet|jet fighter]] pilots over their [[flight suit]]. It was found that, especially with the increase in speed and power of the jet engine, high-G maneuvers could result in a [[pilot]]'s blood pooling in their lower extremeties, starving the pilot's brain of oxygen and causing them to blackout. The suit operates by squeezing the legs and lower abdomen of the pilot during high-G maneuvers, forcing their blood back into the upper body, enabling them to better resist blacking out from G-forces.

Please only apply this tag if the G-suit itself is actually visible, which by necessity would mean that the pilots' legs are visible. 

h4. Examples
* !post #3750155
* !post #6739190

title: mokke_(jibaku_shounen_hanako-kun)
body:
[[Rabbit]]-like fantasy [[creature]]s from  [[Jibaku Shounen Hanako-Kun]]. They are often used as a mascot character of the series.

They have the ability to distort their bodies by stretching their shape at will; when feeling threatened, they have been shown to stack upon one another, and amalgamate into a [[monster|monstrous]] form (see image below).

They use their [[rabbit ears|ears]] to carry objects; and they like to steal small trinkets, such as [[pencil]]s. Additionally, they can be bribed by feeding them [[candy]].

* !post #5988360: Official anime art

title: pixel_art
body:
An image drawn with a pixelated art style, typically with large individual pixels and a limited color palette.

This may be either intentional or as a restriction by the software used to create it. This is common in older GIF images as well as images meant to invoke game [[sprite]]s.

Different from [[oekaki]], which has less emphasis on being drawn with individual pixels.

h4. Examples

* !post #7565051: With [[dithering]]
* !post #7606805: [[Isometric]]
* !post #7533961: [[No lineart]]
* !post #3790553: [[Sprite art]]
* !post #4528014: [[LEGO (medium)|]] pixel art

h4. Non-examples

title: donald_trump
body:
[b]Donald John Trump, Sr.[/b] (b. June 14, 1946) is an American politician, media personality, and businessman who was the 45th and 47th President of the [[united states|United States of America]]. 

Born into a wealthy family in the New York City borough of Queens, Trump graduated from the University of Pennsylvania in 1968 with a bachelor's degree in economics. He became the president of his family's real estate business in 1971, renamed it the Trump Organization, and began acquiring and building skyscrapers, hotels, casinos, and golf courses. He launched side ventures, many licensing the Trump name, and filed for six business bankruptcies in the 1990s and 2000s. From 2004 to 2015, he hosted the reality television show [i]The Apprentice[/i], from which the catchphrase "You're fired!" came from, bolstering his fame as a billionaire. Presenting himself as a political outsider, Trump won the 2016 presidential election against the Democratic Party's nominee, [[Hillary Clinton]] and her running mate Virginian Senator [[Tim Kaine]]. His slogan during the campaign was "[[Make America Great Again]]".

After losing the 2020 presidential election to [[Joe Biden]], Trump attempted to overturn the result, culminating in the January 6 Capitol attack in 2021. Trump was impeached in 2019 for abuse of power and obstruction of Congress, and in 2021 for incitement of insurrection; the Senate acquitted him both times. 

On July 13, 2024, Trump was shot in the ear in an [[2024 attempted assassination of Donald Trump|assassination attempt]] at a campaign rally in Butler Township, Pennsylvania. In November 2024, he defeated incumbent vice-president [[Kamala Harris]] and Minnesota governor [[Tim Walz]] to become 47th president of the United States. His running mate was Ohio senator [[JD Vance]]. Along with [[Grover Cleveland]], Trump is one of the only two US Presidents to have served two non-consecutive terms.

Commonly depicted with [[blonde hair]], a [[red necktie]], and, occasionally unbecomingly, [[orange skin]].

* !post #8933759: 2025 inaugural portrait

h4. See also
* [[2024 attempted assassination of Donald Trump]]
* [[Donald Trump please save us (meme)|]]
* [[Trump Hat]]
* [[Trump Mugshot (meme)|]]
* [[Tag Group:People]]

h4. External links

* "Wikipedia: Donald Trump":[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Donald_Trump]

title: volodymyr_zelensky
body:
[[Ukraine|Ukrainian]] politician and former entertainer who has served as the sixth and incumbent president of Ukraine since 2019, most notably during the [[Russo-Ukrainian War|full-scale Russian invasion of Ukraine, which has been ongoing since February 2022.]]. 

Zelenskyy grew up as a native Russian speaker in Kryvyi Rih, a major city of Dnipropetrovsk Oblast in central Ukraine. He obtained a degree in law from the Kryvyi Rih Institute of Economics, but never practiced law and pursued a career in comedy and entertainment. He created the production company [[Kvartal 95]], which produced films, cartoons, and TV shows including the TV series [[Servant of the People]], in which Zelenskyy played a fictional Ukrainian president. The series aired from 2015 to 2019 and was immensely popular. A political party with the same name as the TV show was created in March 2018 by employees of Kvartal 95. Zelenskyy won the election in 2019 with 73.23 percent of the vote in the second round, defeating [[Petro Poroshenko|Poroshenko]] in the biggest landslide in the history of Ukrainian presidential elections.

Zelenskyy's term was originally scheduled to end in May 2024, but the ongoing Russian invasion and the resulting ongoing martial law prevented the regularly scheduled presidential election from being conducted. He is expected to remain president for the duration of the Russo-Ukrainian War. Due to this extension of his term, Zelenskyy is the second-longest serving president in Ukrainian history, after only Kuchma.
other_names: ウォロディミル・ゼレンスキー

title: joe_biden
body:
[b]Joseph Robinette Biden, Jr.[/b] (b. November 20, 1942) is an American [[politician]] who served as vice president to [[Barack Obama]] from [[2009]] to [[2017]] before being [[2020 us election|elected]] as the 46th president of the [[United States]] in [[2020]].

Born in Scranton, Pennsylvania, Biden graduated from the University of Delaware in 1965 and the Syracuse University College of Law in 1968. He was elected to the New Castle County Council in 1970 and the U.S. Senate in 1972. Biden ran unsuccessfully for the 1988 and 2008 Democratic presidential nominations. In 2008, Obama chose Biden as his running mate, and he was a close counselor to Obama as vice president. In the 2020 presidential election, Biden selected [[Kamala Harris]] as his running mate, and they defeated Republican incumbents [[Donald Trump]] and [[Mike Pence]]. He became the first president with a woman vice president. 

Concerns about Biden's age and health persisted throughout his term. He became the first president to turn 80 while in office. Biden initially ran for reelection and, after the Democratic primaries, became the party's presumptive nominee in the 2024 presidential election. After his performance in the first presidential debate, renewed scrutiny from across the political spectrum about his cognitive ability led him to withdraw his candidacy.

* !post #8933911: 2021 inaugural portrait

h4. See also
* [[Biden Blast (meme)|]]
* [[Tag Group:People]]

h4. External links
* "Wikipedia: Joe Biden":[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Joe_Biden]

title: jd_vance
body:
[b]James David Vance[/b] (b. [b]James Donald Bowman[/b]; August 2, 1984) is American [[politician]], author, [[lawyer|attorney]], and veteran, serving as 50th vice president of the [[United States]]. A member of the Republican Party, he represented Ohio in the U.S. Senate from 2023 to 2025.

Born in Middletown, [[Ohio]] and raised primarily in Eastern [[Kentucky]], Vance served in the [[United States Marine Corps|U.S. Marine Corps]] and deployed to [[Iraq War|Iraq]] as a military journalist. He earned a bachelor's degree from Ohio State University and a law degree from Yale Law School. After briefly working as a corporate lawyer and Senate aide, Vance became a venture capitalist with [[Peter Thiel|Peter Thiel's]] Mithril Capital. In 2016, he published [i]Hillbilly Elegy[/i], a bestselling memoir that brought him national attention. 

In July 2024, [[Donald Trump|Trump]] selected Vance as his running mate before the Republican National Convention. Trump and Vance won the 2024 United States presidential election, defeating [[Kamala Harris]] and [[Tim Walz]]. Vance is the first Millennial to serve as vice president, and the third-youngest vice president in U.S. history. 

h4. See also
* [[Tag Group:People]]

h4. External links
* "Wikipedia: JD Vance":[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/JD_Vance]
other_names: ジェームズ・デイヴィッド・ヴァンス

title: kamala_harris
body:
[b]Kamala Devi Harris[/b] (b. October 20, 1964)  is an [[United States|American]] [[politician]] and [[lawyer|attorney]] who served from 2021 to 2025 as the 49th vice president of the United States. She is notably the first woman, and the first person with Black and South Asian ancestry to hold the position of Vice President of the United States and the highest-ranking female and Asian American official in U.S. history. Harris represented [[California]] in the U.S. senate from 2017 to 2021 and was attorney general of California from 2011 to 2017. 

Born in Oakland, California, Harris graduated from Howard University and the University of California, Hastings College of the Law. She began her law career in the office of the district attorney of Alameda County. Harris was recruited to the San Francisco District Attorney's Office and later to the office of the city attorney of [[San Francisco]]. She was elected district attorney of San Francisco in 2003 and attorney general of California in 2010.

Harris sought the 2020 Democratic presidential nomination in 2019, but withdrew from the race before the primaries. [[Joe Biden|Biden]] selected her as his running mate; their ticket defeated the incumbent president and vice president, [[Donald Trump|Trump]] and [[Mike Pence]], in the 2020 presidential election. In July 2024, after Biden withdrew his candidacy from the 2024 presidential election due to health concerns over his advanced age, Harris launched her own presidential campaign with his endorsement. She later became the nominee and selected Minnesota governor [[Tim Walz]] as her running mate. She ultimately lost the election to the Republican nominees, former president Trump and Ohio senator [[JD Vance]].

h4. External links
* "Wikipedia: Kamala Harris":[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kamala_Harris]

title: white-haired_girl_(yamanokami_eaka)

Typically has red eyes, pronounced breasts, and white hair with a "double parted bangs":[/wiki_pages/double-parted_bangs].

title: tim_kaine
body:
[b]Tim Kaine[/b] (b. February 26, 1958) is an [[united states|American]] [[lawyer]] and [[politician]] serving as the junior United States senator from Virginia since 2013. A member of the Democratic Party, he served as the 70th governor of Virginia from 2006 to 2010, and as the 38th lieutenant governor of Virginia from 2002 to 2006. Kaine was the Democratic nominee for vice president of the United States in the 2016 election as [[Hillary Clinton|Hillary Clinton's]] running mate. 

Born in Saint Paul, Minnesota, Kaine grew up in Overland Park, Kansas, graduated from the University of Missouri in Columbia, Missouri, and earned a Juris Doctor degree from Harvard Law School before entering private practice and becoming a lecturer at the University of Richmond School of Law. He was first elected to public office in 1994, when he won a seat on the Richmond city council. On July 22, 2016, Hillary Clinton introduced Kaine as her vice-presidential running mate. The 2016 Democratic National Convention nominated him on July 27. Despite winning a plurality of the national popular vote, the Clinton–Kaine ticket lost the Electoral College, and therefore the election, to the Republican ticket of [[Donald Trump]] and [[Mike Pence]] on November 8, 2016.

h4. External links
* "Wikipedia":[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tim_Kaine]

title: archetype_inception_(fate/grand_order)
body:
The surprise third Ordeal Call in [[Fate/Grand Order]] centered on the MoonCancer class. Its map location is Dubai on the Bleached Earth. [spoiler]It actually takes place on the lunar city of Moon Dubai in 3017 in a different timeline.[/spoiler] It initially released as a limited-time event taking place directly after [[Celeb Summer Experience!]] before being made permanently available.

Released in three parts on the Japanese server on August 28, 2024, September 11, 2024, and September 20, 2024, before being permanently released on February 1, 2025. Players are able to choose between [spoiler][[Kishinami Hakuno (Female) (MoonCancer)|]] and [[Kishinami Hakuno (Male) (MoonCancer)|]][/spoiler] as a reward for completing the ordeal call.

title: valerii_zaluzhnyi
body: Former Ukrainian four-star general. He served as the commander-in-chief of the Armed Forces of Ukraine from July 27th 2021 until February 8th 2024. On 27 July 2021, President [[Volodymyr Zelensky]] appointed Zaluzhnyi as Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, replacing General [[Ruslan Khomchak]] in this position. On 8 February 2024, Zaluzhnyi was replaced as Commander-in-Chief by [[Oleksandr Syrskyi]], previously the commander of the [[Ukrainian Ground Forces]]. Following his replacement, he was decorated with the award Hero of Ukraine by Zelenskyy. The dismissal came amid increasing tension between him and Zelenskyy. He was formally dismissed from the military by Zelenskyy on "health grounds" on 9 May, but was allowed to wear a military uniform.

title: hololive_idol_uniform_(color_rise)
body:
The [[official alternate costume|official]] [[idol clothes]] worn by [[hololive]] members for the 2025 live concert "hololive 6th fes. Color Rise Harmony". designed by [[Amagai Tarou]], the official name is "Color Rise outfit" "according to the artist":[https://x.com/ordan/status/1879935373918540254]

It consists of a [[cropped shirt|cropped]] [[collared shirt|collared]] [[multicolored shirt|multicolored]] [[black shirt|black]] and [[white shirt]] with [[center frills]], a [[single detached sleeve|single detached]] [[puffy detached sleeves|puffy]] [[puffy short sleeves|short sleeve]] [[mismatched sleeves|on the left side]] and a [[single sleeve]] featuring the talent's [[color-coded|key color]] on the right, either a [[black skirt|black]] and [[white skirt|white]] [[miniskirt]] or [[black pants|black]] [[single pantsleg|single-legged pants]], both of them with a color-coded [[overskirt]], ether a  [[thigh strap]] or a [[single thighhigh|single]] [[black thighhighs|black thighhigh]] with a [[single garter strap]], color-coded [[ankle socks]] and of [[lace-up boots|lace-up]] [[ankle boots]] with [[platform boots|platform]] [[platform heels|heels]].

h4. Appearance

title: ronnie_james_dio
body:
One of the most notable [[heavy metal]] singers. He became known for popularizing the famous [[\n/|sign of the horns]]. He was a inspiration for the character [[Dio Brando]] from the manga [[JoJo no Kimyou na Bouken]].

Dio passed away in 2010 of stomach cancer.
other_names: ロニー・ジェイムス・ディオ

title: dio_(band)
body: A band formed by the singer [[Ronnie James Dio]] in 1982. Known for their hits Rainbow In The Dark, Holy Diver & Don't Talk to Strangers.

title: black_sabbath
body:
[b]Black Sabbath[/b] were an English rock band formed in Birmingham in 1968 by guitarist Tony Iommi, drummer Bill Ward, bassist Geezer Butler and vocalist [[Ozzy Osbourne]]. 

They are often cited as pioneers of [[heavy metal]] music.

The band helped define the genre with releases such as Black Sabbath (1970), Paranoid (1970), and Master of Reality (1971). The band had multiple line-up changes following Osbourne's departure in 1979, with Iommi being the only constant member throughout its history.

h1. See also
Wikipedia: "Black Sabbath":https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Black_Sabbath
Metallum:  "Black Sabbath":https://www.metal-archives.com/bands/Black_Sabbath/99

title: wahoo_kai_(kancolle)
body:
The upgraded form of [[Wahoo (Kancolle)|]].

Visual changes include [[Japanese flag]] [[kill markings]] on the part of Wahoo's white scarf wrapped around her neck, and the words "Shoot the Sunza Bitches" on the part of the scarf trailing away from her. A full-sized [[Oerlikon 20mm Gun]] is also added to Wahoo's arsenal, with a red-colored [[gun sling]] holding it over Wahoo's shoulder, separate from her other rigging.

title: heinkel_wolfe
body:
[[Hellsing]] character. A member of Iscariot working directly under [[Alexander Anderson]], and typically partnered with [[Takagi Yumie|Yumiko Takagi]]. She is a [[tomboy]] with [[short hair|short]] [[blonde hair]] wearing a [[crossdressing|male priest's uniform]]. She fights with two [[handgun|pistols]] and is typically seen smoking a [[cigarette]].
[spoilers]After being shot in the cheek by [[captain (hellsing)|the Captain]], she has a [[Glasgow smile]] and [[bandaged head]], though her mouth and eyes remain uncovered.[/spoilers]
other_names: ハインケル・ウーフー

title: wahoo_(kancolle)
body:
[i][[Kantai Collection]][/i]'s personification of the US submarine USS [i]Wahoo[/i] (SS-238), drawn by [[Shizuma Yoshinori]]. 

Wahoo is depicted with either light [[brown hair]] or [[grey hair]] and [[grey eyes]], a [[hair ornament]] with her hull number "238", and [[red gloves|red]] and [[blue gloves|blue]] [[partially fingerless gloves]] on her hands. Like her sisters, Wahoo wears a [[two-tone]] black and white high-leg [[competition swimsuit]] with black [[rudder footwear]], though Wahoo personalizes with a [[white scarf]] and an [[American flag print]] [[denim]] [[miniskirt]]. Her base form carries only the same [[torpedo launcher]] [[rigging]] as her sisters.

Wahoo's Kai form, however, gains additional touches as a nod to her status as one of the most successful submarines of the Pacific War. She slings an [[Oerlikon 20mm Gun]] behind her rigging, and decorates her scarf with [[Japanese flag]] [[kill markings]] and the words, "Shoot the [[profanity|Sunza Bitches]]".

h4. Appearance
* !post #8961300: Base
* !post #8961304: [[Wahoo Kai (Kancolle)|Kai]]

h4. [i]Gato[/i]-class submarines

* [b]Wahoo[/b] (SS-238)
* [[Scamp (kancolle)|]] (SS-277)

title: ruby_rose
body:
Ruby Rose is the protagonist of [[RWBY]], a 3DCG series produced by Rooster Teeth. 

Ruby is the "R" in RWBY, and is associated with the color red. Her character design is inspired by [[Little Red Riding Hood (grimm)|]]. [[Yang Xiao Long]] is her half-sister. She likes cookies, drinks milk, and has a cheerful disposition.

h4. Abilities 

She wields a large [[scythe]]/[[gun]] hybrid weapon named [[Crescent Rose]], a "High-Caliber Sniper-Scythe" (HCSS). Her symbol is a [[rose]], and red [[rose petals]] appear when she uses her speed semblance (special ability).  

When in the presence of [[grimm (rwby)|]], her eyes are able to glow brightly with a silvery light. When this ability is used, any [[grimm (rwby)|]] in front of this light will be turned to dust or petrified, depending on how large the grimm is; very strong ones may be able to partially resist the effect.

h4. Physical characteristics 

Ruby has [[grey eyes]] and [[short hair|short]] [[two-tone hair|two-toned]] [[gradient hair|gradient]] [[red hair]]/[[black hair]], or black with red streaks. 

In earlier volumes of the series, she stood 5'2" tall (including boots). As of Volume 7, she is 5'4" tall.

h4. Attire 

She is usually seen in a [[red cape|red]] [[cape]] or [[hooded cloak]] secured with [[cross]]-shaped pins. Her default outfit includes a [[long sleeves|long sleeved]] [[black dress]] (with red [[frilled dress|frills]]) tied with a [[corset]], [[black pantyhose]], and [[black footwear|black]] [[knee boots]] with red [[lace-up boots|laces]]. Her [[belt]] is a [[bandolier]] with large [[bullet]] [[cartridge|cartridges]].  Most of her oufits include a [[rose]]-shaped badge somewhere on them.

Her Beacon [[school uniform]] consists of a [[white shirt|white]] [[blouse]] with [[neck ribbon]], brown [[blazer]], and [[plaid skirt]], plus her customary red cape.  

h4. External links

* "RWBY Wikia: Ruby Rose":https://rwby.wikia.com/wiki/Ruby_Rose

title: mauser_c96
body:
A semi-automatic [[handgun]] made by German arms manufacturer Mauser from 1896 to 1937. It used an integral box magazine in front of the trigger loaded by [[clip (weapon)|stripper clips]] and had a distinctive "broomhandle" style grip that could be used with a detachable [[shoulder stock]]. Originally chambered for the 7.63×25mm Mauser, while later and foreign variants were available in 9mm Parabellum, .45 ACP and more.

This tag also applies to its selective fire variant, the later [b]M-712 [i]Schnellfeuer[/i][/b] with higher-capacity [[magazine (weapon)|removable magazines]].

* !post #6008144

h4. See also

* [[Borchardt C-93]]
* [[List of Weapons]]
* [[C96 (Girls' Frontline)]]

h4. External links

* "Wikipedia: Mauser C96":https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mauser_C96

title: kirby's_dream_collection_special_edition
body:
A compilation title released for the [[Wii]] in 2012, in commemoration of the 20th anniversary of [[Kirby (series)|]]. Contains six classic Kirby games, three episodes of [[kirby: right back at ya|Kirby: Right Back at Ya!]], and a challenge mode based on [[Kirby's Return to Dream Land]] (notably marking the return of [[Magolor]]).

h4. Games included
* [[Kirby's Dream Land]]
* [[Kirby's Adventure]]
* [[Kirby's Dream Land 2]]
* [[Kirby Super Star]]
* [[Kirby's Dream Land 3]]
* [[Kirby 64|Kirby 64: The Crystal Shards]]

title: captain_(hellsing)
body:
[b]The Captain[/b] is the bodyguard of [[major_(hellsing)|The Major]] and member of the Millennium Organization. A former member of the Waffen-SS, the Captain is a natural werewolf, with the ability to transform between his human and werewolf forms at will. He never speaks and his name is Hans Gunsche.

title: omaru_polka
body:
A [[Virtual YouTuber|VTuber]] and [[hololive]]'s [[holoFive|5th]] [[NePoLaBo|generation]]. Designed by [[Kou Mashiro]].

She is a circus performer with a [[playing card theme|playing card motif]] who happens to be a fennec [[fox girl]] with long [[animal ear fluff|fluffy]] [[fox ears]] and a [[fox tail|tail]]. She has [[long hair|long]] [[blonde hair]] with [[pink hair|pink]] and [[black hair|black]] [[streaked hair|streaks]], card suit [[facial mark]]s [[mark under eye|under her eyes]], [[purple eyes]] with [[symbol-shaped pupils]] which seem to change with her emotions, often [[heart-shaped pupils|heart]] or [[star-shaped pupils|star-shaped]].

Her default hairstyle is a [[single braid|single]] [[side braid]] [[hair over shoulder|over her shoulder]], [[double-parted bangs]] reaching [[hair between eyes|between her eyes]] and a [[blue bow|blue]] [[hair bow]] on her signature propeller [[ahoge]].

title: irys_(hololive)
body:
A [[virtual YouTuber|VTuber]] of [[hololive English]]. A Nephilim who, upon her second awakening, has descended upon the current era to bring hope through song. Designed by [[Redjuice]].

She has [[very long hair|very long]] [[purple hair|dark purple]] and [[red hair]]. True to her lore, she is portrayed with a [[halo]] made out of 2 layers of black and white stars, [[heterochromia|heterochromic]] [[pink eyes|purple]] and [[blue eyes]], black [[horns]], [[pointy ears]], and [[asymmetrical wings|differently-colored]] [[crystal wings]].

Formerly operated under the solo "Project:HOPE" from July 2021 until October 2023, when she was "reassigned":[https://twitter.com/hololive_En/status/1711232551061516715] to a new group with the four remaining [[holoCouncil]] members as "hololive English -Promise-". 

Similar to [[hololive]] Japan's [[AZKi (hololive)|]], her name is stylized [i]IRyS[/i], with only one letter in lower case.

title: ehoumaki
body:
[b]Ehoumaki[/b] (恵方巻き, lit. "[[ehou|Lucky-Direction]] [[Makizushi]]") refers to the custom in the Kansai region of eating a [i]futomaki[/i] (a type of [[sushi]]) on the evening of [[Setsubun]] (February 3rd) while facing "Ehou" (the lucky direction that changes according to the year) or to the [[makizushi]] itself. Much like [[Valentine]]'s Day chocolate, it is almost a man-made custom spread by promotional activities of concerned bodies for reasons purely related to profit and sales.

In the 1970s, it spread through the Kansai region thanks to [[nori (seaweed)|nori]] distributors/wholesalers and [[sushi]] shops, and in the 2000s, it spread throughout Japan thanks to the [[convenience store]] industry. In other words, this custom is very new to places outside of Kansai.

h4. See also

* [[swiss roll]] (Recently, roll cakes are being sold as opportunistic products on Setsubun.)
* [[Setsubun]]
* [[Tag Group:Food Tags]]
* [[Tag Group:Holidays and Celebrations]]

title: archetto_(arknights)
body:
[i]Cleric of Landen Monastery Archetto, the power to rebuild faith stronger than faith itself.[/i]

A playable Sniper Operator in [[Arknights]].

Real Name: Hildegard

h4. Profile
[expand]
[table]
[tbody]
      [tr][td]Place of Birth:[/td]
      [td]Laterano[/td][/tr]
      [tr][td]Birthday:[/td]
      [td]November 16[/td][/tr]
      [tr][td]Race:[/td]
      [td]Liberi[/td][/tr]
      [tr][td]Height:[/td]
      [td]152 cm[/td][/tr]
      [tr][td]Combat Experience:[/td]
      [td]2 years[/td][/tr]
  [/tbody]
[/table]
[/expand]

A half-Victorian, half-Laterano cleric from Landen Monastery temporarily serving as an operator in Rhodes Island as part of a business venture in hopes of keeping the monastery alive. Very assertive when it comes to business and making profit.

Uses a compound bow as her weapon of choice.

Her motif is based on the [[Griffin]].

Her [[voice actor]] is [[Minase Inori]].

title: major_(hellsing)
body: [b]The Major[/b] is the supreme commander of the organization known as Millennium, and the main antagonist of the [[Hellsing]] series. A former Nazi who served during the Second World War, the Major is characterized by an all-consuming obsession with war in all of its aspects. He does not care for the reasons behind any war, and appears to have no political or ideological leanings, and wishes only to wage war for all eternity. His name is more then likely Max Montana.

title: oberon_(third_ascension)_(fate)
body:
[[Oberon (fate)|]] in his Third Ascension form from [[Fate/Grand Order]]. His hair is [[black hair|black]], and he wears a blue [[diamond hairband]]. He wears a [[white shirt]], [[black pants]], and a large [[black cloak|black]] [[fur-trimmed cloak]] comprised of multiple torn [[fairy wings]]. His right hand remains humanoid, but his left arm turns into a dark [[claws|claw]], and his legs and feet also turn dark. He gains a pair of [[dragonfly wings]], which aren't capable of helping him fly.

[b]Major spoilers for Lostbelt no. 6: Fairy Realm of the Round Table, Avalon le Fay![/b]

[spoiler]This is his true Pretender-class form when he awakens as Oberon Vortigern, the Insect of the Abyss summoned to destroy the British Lostbelt.[/spoiler]

[b]This Ascension is considered a major spoiler for the events of Lostbelt no. 6: Fairy Realm of the Round Table, Avalon le Fay. The [[spoilers]] tag MUST be added when tagging this Ascension![/b]

title: oberon_(fate)
body:
Servant introduced in the [[Avalon le Fae (fate/grand order)|British Lostbelt]] of [[Fate/Grand Order]]. He is known as the King of the Fairies in medieval and Renaissance literature, and is best known as a character in [[William Shakespeare (fate)|]]'s play [[A Midsummer Night's Dream]]. He initially appears as a Ruler-class servant who is able to switch to Archer, Caster, and Rider classes at will, before being revealed as the first Pretender-class servant in the franchise. [spoiler]His true name is [b]Oberon Vortigern[/b], a servant summoned by the planet itself to destroy the British Lostbelt who is a fusion of the mythological Oberon, the Oberon from A Midsummer Night's Dream, and [[Artoria Pendragon (fate)|]]'s uncle Vortigern.[/spoiler]

His third ascension artwork is locked until players complete Avalon le Fae.

[b]Character Design:[/b] [[Umino Chika]]
[b]Voice Actor:[/b] [[Toyonaga Toshiyuki]]

title: habetrot_(fate)
body:
Rider-class Servant introduced in the [[Avalon le Fae (fate/grand order)|British Lostbelt]] of [[Fate/Grand Order]]. A fairy from British and Scottish folklore associated with the [[spinning wheel]], who helps make girls into brides. Somewhat of a [[minigirl]], at only 50~60cm (19~24") tall. Often seen alongside [[cat]]s, and is nicknamed Habenyan or Habbycat.

In the British Lostbelt, [spoiler]she was originally a fairy named Totorot allied with [[Aesc (fate)|]] who ended up meeting [[Mash Kyrielight]] when she rayshifted back in time. After Aesc decided to become [[Morgan le Fay (fate)|]], Habetrot ends up guarding Mash Kyrielight's [[Black Barrel (type-moon)|]] inside her spinning wheel while Mash was kept frozen in ice. She hid her identity when meeting Mash again during Chaldea's arrival, and ends up being erased as a time paradox once Mash remembers who she is during the battle against [[Cernunnos (fate)|]].[/spoiler]

She is given as a reward to players upon completing Avalon le Fae. Similarly to event servants, she doesn't change appearance as she ascends. She's often paired up with [[Miss Crane (fate)|]] in official material due to both being servants who sew.

[b]Character Design:[/b] [[Hirai Yukio]]
[b]Voice Actress:[/b] [[Itou Ayasa]]

title: suzumori_asuka
body:
A major character in [[Sounan Desuka?]]. Asuka is a cheerful and energetic student athlete on the basketball club, but also the most careless in a survival situation.

Asuka has [[short hair|short]] [[messy_hair|messy]] [[brown hair]] with [[sidelocks]], [[swept bangs]] and an [[ahoge]], has either [[purple eyes|purple]] or [[brown eyes]], and [[large breasts]].

Asuka wears a standard [[serafuku]] with a [[white shirt]] with a [[red ribbon]] under a brown [[sweater vest]] and [[blue skirt|blue]] [[pleated skirt]], and [[kneehighs]].  She also wears [[white panties]] with a bunny on them and a simple [[white bra]].

Voiced by [[Kouno Hiyori]].

title: koyanskaya_(fate)
body:
Alter Ego-class Servant seen in [[Fate/Grand Order]]. She is originally introduced as Tamamo Vitch, one of the [[Tamamo Nine]]. [[Shi Huang Di (fate)|]] also calls her "Da Ji", a Chinese figure who ruined dynasties.

[spoilers]However, Koyanskaya actually has no real True Name to speak of, and is entirely unrelated to either the Tamamo Nine or Da Ji. Koyanskaya is "the Tunguska event given form", the embodiment of the thoughts of animals persecuted by mankind, and chose to manifest in the Saint Graph of Tamamo no Mae due to their shared attribute of being a "beast that is supposed to live for revenge against humans." She likens herself to "the Tamamo no Mae from another world," considering Tamamo to be her original, but she's not actually Tamamo nor is she part of the Tamamo Nine.

She was given the name Yaskaya by the manifested Heroic Spirit [[dobrynya nikitich (fate)|Dobrynya Nikitich]], which she later mistakenly remembered as Koyanskaya. This is an allusion to the Shinto goddess [[Konohanasakuya-hime (mythology)|]], to which Koyanskaya has no relation whatsoever.

When she was defeated in her Beast form, she split into two distinct but similar fragments, Koyanskaya of Light and Koyanskaya of Darkness, in a contrast akin to yin and yang.[/spoilers]

She has been released as an Assassin class Servant in Fate/Grand Order under the name "Koyanskaya of Light", and shortly afterwards as a Foreigner class Servant under the name "Koyanskaya of Darkness".

[b]Character Design:[/b] [[Wada Arco]]
[b]Voice Actress:[/b] [[Saitou Chiwa]]

title: percival_(fate)
body:
Lancer-class Servant introduced in the [[Avalon le Fae (fate/grand order)|British Lostbelt]] of [[Fate/Grand Order]]. The second Knight of the Round Table, also known as the Holy Knight of the Dove. He wields the [[spear]] [[Longinus (weapon) (fate)|Longinus]] in battle. He and [[Sinfjotli (fate)|]] are the two servants of [[Gagam Istorre]] in [[Fate:Lost Einherjar]].

In [[Avalon le Fae (fate/grand order)|]], [spoiler]he is actually the adoptive younger brother of [[Melusine (fate)|]]. He was given [[Aesc (fate)|]]'s [[Staff of Selection (fate)|Spear of Selection]] by his foster mother, [[Aurora (fate)|]], in order to fight against the calamities facing Britain. Using its power causes him to lose years off his lifespan, resulting in his adult appearance while actually only being fourteen.[/spoiler]

[b]Character Design:[/b] [[Shiramine (srmn09)|]]
[b]Voice Actor:[/b] [[Matsukaze Masaya]]

title: melusine_(fate)
body:
Lancer-class Servant introduced in the [[Avalon le Fae (fate/grand order)|British Lostbelt]] of [[Fate/Grand Order]]. Despite her initial introductory title as Fairy Knight [[Lancelot (fate/grand order)|]], she is not a genderbent version of him.

She is the adoptive daughter of [[Aurora (fate)|]]. [spoiler]She is actually the white dragon of Britain [[Albion (fate)|]], reborn as a fairy. She is also [[Percival (fate)|]]'s adoptive sister.[/spoiler]
